Contents.Content: SELECT Pat_master_index.Patient_id AS PatientCode ,Pat_master_index.Inp_no AS MedicalRecordCode ,Pat_master_index.Id_no AS PatientIDCard ,Pat_master_index.Patient_id AS SocialSecurityCard ,Pat_master_index.name AS PatientName ,Pat_master_index.sex AS PatientSex ,Pat_master_index.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday ,floor(months_between(sysdate,Pat_master_index.Date_of_birth)/12) AS PatientAge ,Pat_master_index.Mailing_address as PatientAddress ,NULL AS HighRiskInfectivity FROM Pat_master_index left join Operation_master on Pat_master_index.Patient_id=Operation_master.Patient_id WHERE rownum=1 {0} Order by Start_date_time DESC

SELECT Pats_in_hospital.patient_id as InPatientCode, Pats_in_hospital.Dept_code AS WardArea, Pats_in_hospital.Ward_Code AS InDepartment, Pats_in_hospital.Nursing_Class AS Nursing, Pats_in_hospital.Bed_no AS BedNumber, Pats_in_hospital.doctor_in_charge as InPatientDoctor, NULL AS BedNurse FROM Pats_in_hospital WHERE rownum <= 200 {0}

SELECT Operation_Name.Operation AS OperationName, Pat_master_index.Inp_no AS MedicalRecordCode, Operation_master.Oper_id AS OperationID, Operation_master.Operating_dept AS OperationDepartment, Operation_master.Operating_room_no AS OperationRoom, Operation_master.surgeon AS OperationDoctor, Operation_master.Start_date_time AS OperationDate, Operation_master.Start_date_time AS OperationBegin, Operation_master.End_date_time AS OperationEnd, Operation_master.First_operation_nurse AS HandWashingNurse1, Operation_master.Second_operation_nurse AS HandWashingNurse2, Operation_master.First_supply_nurse AS ItinerateNurse1, Operation_master.Second_supply_nurse AS ItinerateNurse2, NULL AS OperationOrderCode, NULL AS OperationStatus FROM Operation_master inner join Pat_master_index on Operation_master.Patient_id=Pat_master_index.Patient_id LEFT JOIN Operation_Name ON Operation_master.Patient_Id = Operation_Name.Patient_Id AND Operation_master.Visit_Id = Operation_Name.Visit_Id AND Operation_master.Oper_Id = Operation_Name.Oper_Id WHERE rownum <= 200 {0} order by Operation_master.Start_date_time DESC

SELECT Pat_master_index.Patient_id AS RegisterCode, Clinic_master.Visit_no AS RegisterNumber, Clinic_master.Visit_dept AS RegisterDepartment, Clinic_master.Visit_date AS RegisterDateTime, Clinic_master.Clinic_type AS OutPatientEmergency FROM Clinic_master LEFT JOIN Pat_master_index ON Clinic_master.Patient_id = Pat_master_index.Patient_id WHERE rownum <= 200 {0} Order By Visit_Date DESC

SELECT Pat_master_index.Patient_id AS PatientCode ,Pat_master_index.Inp_no AS MedicalRecordCode ,Pat_master_index.Id_no AS PatientIDCard ,Pat_master_index.Patient_id AS SocialSecurityCard ,Pat_master_index.name AS PatientName ,Pat_master_index.sex AS PatientSex ,Pat_master_index.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday ,floor(months_between(sysdate,Pat_master_index.Date_of_birth)/12) AS PatientAge ,Pat_master_index.Mailing_address as PatientAddress FROM Pat_master_index WHERE rownum <= 200 {0}

SELECT Pat_master_index.Inp_no AS VALUE, Pat_master_index.Inp_no AS MedicalRecordCode, Operation_Name.Operation AS NAME, Pat_master_index.name AS PatientName, Pat_master_index.sex AS PatientSex, Pat_master_index.name AS DISPLAYNAME, Pat_master_index.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday, Operation_Name.Operation AS OperationName, Operation_master.Oper_id AS OperationID, Operation_master.Operating_dept AS OperationDepartment, Operation_master.Operating_room_no AS OperationRoom, Operation_master.surgeon AS OperationDoctor, Operation_master.Start_date_time AS OperationDate FROM Operation_master LEFT JOIN Pat_master_index ON Operation_master.Patient_id = Pat_master_index.Patient_id LEFT JOIN Operation_Name ON Operation_master.Patient_Id = Operation_Name.Patient_Id AND Operation_master.Visit_Id = Operation_Name.Visit_Id AND Operation_master.Oper_Id = Operation_Name.Oper_Id WHERE rownum <= 200 {0} Order By Operation_master.Start_date_time DESC

SELECT Pat_master_index.Patient_id AS VALUE, Pat_master_index.Patient_id AS InPatientCode, Pat_master_index.name AS NAME, Pat_master_index.sex AS PatientSex, Pat_master_index.name AS DISPLAYNAME, Pats_in_hospital.Ward_Code AS WardArea, floor(months_between(sysdate,Pat_master_index.Date_of_birth)/12) AS PatientAge, Pats_in_hospital.Dept_code AS InDepartment, Pats_in_hospital.Nursing_Class AS Nursing, Pats_in_hospital.bed_no AS Bedno, NULL AS BedNurse, NULL AS InPatientDoctor FROM Pats_in_hospital LEFT JOIN Pat_master_index ON Pats_in_hospital.Patient_id = Pat_master_index.Patient_id WHERE 1=1 {0} Order By InPatientCode DESC

SELECT Pat_master_index.Patient_id AS VALUE, Clinic_master.Visit_no AS VisitNo, Pat_master_index.name AS NAME, Pat_master_index.sex AS SEX, Pat_master_index.name AS DISPLAYNAME, Clinic_master.Visit_dept AS VisitDepartment, Clinic_master.Visit_date AS VisitDate, Clinic_master.Clinic_type AS ClinicType, Pat_master_index.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday FROM Clinic_master LEFT JOIN Pat_master_index ON Clinic_master.Patient_id = Pat_master_index.Patient_id WHERE rownum <= 200 {0} Order By VisitDate DESC

SELECT OPERATION_SCHEDULE.PATIENT_ID PATIENTID, PAT_MASTER_INDEX.NAME, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.BED_NO BEDNO, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.SCHEDULED_DATE_TIME SCHEDULEDDATETIME, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.OPERATING_ROOM OPERATINGROOM, replace(replace(Operation_Name.Operation,'''','‘'),',','，') as OPERATOR, DIAG_BEFORE_OPERATION as DIAGBEFOREOPERATION, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.SURGEON , OPERATION_SCHEDULE.FIRST_ASSISTANT FIRSTASSISTANT, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.SECOND_ASSISTANT SECONDASSISTANT, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.THIRD_ASSISTANT THIRDASSISTANT, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.FOURTH_ASSISTANT FOURTHASSISTANT, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.ANESTHESIA_METHOD ANESTHESIAMETHOD, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.FIRST_OPERATION_NURSE FIRSTOPERATIONNURSE, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.SECOND_OPERATION_NURSE SECONDOPERATIONNURSE, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.NOTES_ON_OPERATION NOTESONOPERATION, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.SECOND_SUPPLY_NURSE SECONDSUPPLYNURSE, 0 as FLAG, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.VISIT_ID, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_ID, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.ANESTHESIA_DOCTOR,
'' DEPT_ALIAS, PAT_MASTER_INDEX.SEX, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.DIAG_BEFORE_OPERATION, PAT_MASTER_INDEX.DATE_OF_BIRTH DATEOFBIRTH , '' bed_label , OPERATION_SCHEDULE.DEPT_STAYED, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.OPERATING_ROOM_NO, '' OPERATION_CLASS, OPERATION_SCHEDULE.SEQUENCE, DEPT_DICT.DEPT_NAME DEPTNAME, '' LOCATION FROM OPERATION_SCHEDULE, DEPT_DICT, PAT_MASTER_INDEX,operation_name WHERE ( operation_schedule.patient_id = pat_master_index.patient_id (+)) and ( operation_schedule.dept_stayed = dept_dict.dept_code (+)) and (operation_schedule.patient_id = operation_name.patient_id (+)) and (operation_schedule.visit_id = operation_name.visit_id (+)) and (operation_schedule.oper_id = operation_name.oper_id (+)) {0} order by OPERATION_SCHEDULE.scheduled_date_time DESC
